alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Southern Carroll; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 14 at 3:20AM EDT until March 15 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...SIGNIFICANT WINTER STORM TODAY INTO WEDNESDAY... .Rapidly strengthening low pressure approaches southern New England this morning, and remains in the Gulf of Maine into tomorrow. Snow continues overspreading the area during the morning hours today. Greatest snowfall will likely fall at higher terrain across the Monadnocks, Sunapee, the Ossippees, and White Mountains. At lower elevations, heavy and wet snow is expected, likely causing scattered power outages today and tonight. Gusty northeast to north winds of 40 to 55 mph this afternoon and evening could accentuate the power outage risk this afternoon. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 8 and 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Maine. Portions of central, northern, and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until Noon EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Significant snowfall and periods of heavy snowfall rates will combine to create low visibility and very dangerous driving conditions. The hazardous conditions are likely to impact the morning commute across southern New Hampshire, with widespread impacts to the evening commute expected in all areas. The strong winds and weight of snow on tree limbs will likely lead to downed power lines and power outages. A period of damaging winds is possible late this afternoon and evening, which combined with the wet snow could enhance power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org Persons should consider delaying all travel. Motorists should use extreme caution if travel is absolutely necessary.
